response.name: SUCCESS
Move Folder
Delete Folder
Upload File
Get Files
Update File (Rename)
Download File
response.body:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

echo "============================================"
echo "   Android Studio Auto Installer (Ubuntu)"
echo "============================================"

# Install dependencies
echo "[1/6] Installing dependencies..."
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y wget unzip lib32stdc++6 lib32z1

# Download latest Android Studio
if [[ ! -f android-studio.tar.gz ]]; then
    echo "[2/6] Downloading Android Studio..."
    wget -O android-studio.tar.gz https://redirector.gvt1.com/edgedl/android/studio/ide-zips/latest/android-studio-2024.tar.gz || \
    wget -O android-studio.tar.gz https://r4---sn-h5mi0c-q5jl.gvt1.com/edgedl/android/studio/ide-zips/2025.2.1.7/android-studio-2025.2.1.7-linux.tar.gz?cms_redirect=yes&met=1763277117,&mh=oe&mip=103.238.115.167&mm=28&mn=sn-h5mi0c-q5jl&ms=nvh&mt=1763275106&mv=u&mvi=4&pl=24&rms=nvh,nvh&shardbypass=sd&smhost=r4---sn-h5mi0c-q5j6.gvt1.com
fi
# Extract
echo "[3/6] Extracting files..."
sudo rm -rf /opt/android-studio
sudo tar -xzf android-studio.tar.gz -C /opt
rm android-studio.tar.gz

# Create symbolic link
echo "[4/6] Creating symlink..."
sudo ln -sf /opt/android-studio/bin/studio.sh /usr/local/bin/android-studio

# Create desktop entry
echo "[5/6] Creating Desktop icon..."
cat <<EOF | sudo tee /usr/share/applications/android-studio.desktop
[Desktop Entry]
Version=1.0
Type=Application
Name=Android Studio
Exec=/opt/android-studio/bin/studio.sh
Icon=/opt/android-studio/bin/studio.png
Terminal=false
StartupNotify=true
Categories=Development;IDE;
EOF

sudo chmod +x /usr/share/applications/android-studio.desktop

# Add to PATH
echo "[6/6] Adding to PATH..."
if ! grep -q "ANDROID_STUDIO" ~/.bashrc; then
    echo 'export PATH=$PATH:/opt/android-studio/bin # ANDROID_STUDIO' >> ~/.bashrc
fi

echo "============================================"
echo " Android Studio Installed Successfully!"
echo " Launch from: Applications  Android Studio"
echo " or run: android-studio"
echo "============================================"
